dynlights.settings.group.name: Dynamic Lights Settings
dynlights.lighting_setting.page.name: Lighting Settings
dynlights.quality_mode.name: Quality Mode (OFF, SLOW, FAST, REALTIME)
dynlights.entity_lighting.name: Dynamic Entity Lighting
dynlights.tile_entity_lighting.name: Dynamic TileEntity Lighting
dynlights.page.name: Dynamic Lights
dynlights.dynlight_speed.name: Dynamic Lights Speed
dynlights.dynlight_speed.tooltip:
Controls how often dynamic lights will update. 


Lighting recalculation can be expensive, so slower values will give better performance. 


Off - Self explanatory 
Slow - Twice a second 
Fast - Five times a second 
Realtime - Every tick
dynlights.entity_lights.name: Dynamic Entity Lights
dynlights.entity_lights.tooltip:
Turning this on will show dynamic lighting on entities (dropped items, mobs, etc). 

This can drastically increase the amount of lighting updates, even when you're not holding a torch.
dynlights.block_lights.name: Dynamic Block Lights
dynlights.block_lights.tooltip:
Turning this on will show dynamic lighting on tile entities (furnaces, modded machines, etc). 

This can drastically increase the amount of lighting updates, even when you're not holding a torch.
